name: postiz-extension
description: A simple chrome & firefox extension template with Vite, React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); try{fs.rmSync('dist',{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(e){}" && vite build --config vite.config.chrome.ts && zip -r extension.zip dist
scripts.dev: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); try{fs.rmSync('dist',{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(e){}" && dotenv -e ../../.env -- vite build --config vite.config.chrome.ts --mode development --watch
